name: Alcohol Free Spritz - Abstinence Blood Orange Spritz
description: Discover the Abstinence Blood Orange Apéritif by World of NIX, Gold Medal 2021 winner. Vegan, alcohol-free, ideal for an alcohol-free spritz or a negroni.

name: Alcohol-free Gin - Abstinence Cape Citrus
description: Discover Abstinence Cape Citrus alternative to gin. Perfect for an alcohol-free Gin & Tonic. Taste lime, grapefruit, pepper, ginger, buchu and fennel.

name: Alcohol-free Gin - Abstinence Cape Fynbos
description: Discover the alcohol-free gin from Abstinence Cape Fynbos now. 0.0% alcohol. Delicious citrus notes and ideal for a nice alcohol-free Gin & Tonic.

name: Abstinence Cape Malt | Non-alcoholic whisky alternative
description: Abstinence Cape Malt: a premium non-alcoholic whisky with notes of vanilla, and a hint of peat smoke. Perfect for whisky cocktails such as the Old Fashioned.

name: Abstinence Cape Spice | Non-alcoholic rum alternative
description: Abstinence Cape Spice: a premium alcohol-free rum with notes of vanilla, coconut, caramel and toffee. For cocktails such as a Dark & Stormy or Cuba Libre.

name: Abstinence Lemon Aperitif - Fresh alcohol-free aperitif
description: Abstinence Lemon Aperitif is a non-alcoholic aperitif with fresh citrus notes and a subtle spicy aftertaste. Perfect as an aperitif or spritz! Order now.

name: Alcoholfree Sparkling Tea - Acala Mimosa
description: Discover Acala Mimosa: a sparkling, alcohol-free tea from Lithuania, with orange and tropical notes. Perfect as an elegant aperitif, with pure spring water.

name: Acala Red - Fruity sparkling tea
description: Discover Acala Red, a sparkling tea with rich red fruits and a hint of herbs. Perfect for stylish aperitif moments. Order directly at World of NIX!

name: Acala Rosé - Elegant sparkling tea
description: Enjoy the Acala Rosé, a refined sparkling tea with floral notes and a light berry flavour. Perfect for summer evenings and brunches. Order now!

name: Acala Spritz Style - Luxury Sparkling Tea
description: Taste Acala Spritz Style, a refined sparkling tea with fresh, spicy notes. Perfect for a stylish drink, aperitif or festive moments.

name: Alcohol-free Sparkling Tea - Acala Spritz Style Magnum
description: Discover the kombucha of Acala. 0.0% alcohol. Smell and taste of blood orange, grapefruit, red berries and delicate hints of herbs. Bottle magnum 1.5L.

name: Alcohol-free Sparkling Tea - Acala White Wine Style
description: Discover now the Light sparkling kombucha Acala. 0.0% alcohol. made from flower hemp tea, spicy lemongrass and green tea from the famous Yunnan region.

name: Acala Winter Style - Winter sparkling tea| World of NIX
description: Taste Acala Winter Style, a sparkling tea with warm, wintery flavours and a hint of spice. Perfect for holidays, drinks and cold, cosy evenings.

name: Acala The Collection - Luxury Sparkling Tea Set
description: Discover Acala The Collection, a luxurious set of sparkling teas with refined flavours. Perfect as a gift or for stylish moments during festive occasions.

name: All The Bitter Aromatic - Non-alcoholic bitter
description: Discover All The Bitter Aromatic, a non-alcoholic bitter with complex herbs and citrus. Perfect for cocktails or as a refined addition to your drinks.
